mangas.title: Dimensional Drifters
mangas.author: Yuki Tanaka
mangas.description: A group of high school students with extraordinary powers find themselves pulled into a cosmic war across different dimensions. They must learn to control their abilities and work together to save reality from collapsing.

mangas.title: Crimson Echo
mangas.author: Akira Ito
mangas.description: In a city fueled by steam and secrets, a detective with a clockwork heart hunts a phantom killer. Each clue unravels a conspiracy that threatens to shatter the fragile peace of the neo-Victorian metropolis.
